headline: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated to Present at the UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (Nasdaq: HBAN) will participate in the UBS Financial Services Conference on Monday, February 10, 2025. Zach Wasserman, chief financial officer, Brant Standridge, president, Consumer and Regional Banking, and Scott Kleinman, president, Commercial Banking, are scheduled to present to analysts and investors at 8:50 AM (Eastern Time). They will discuss business trends, financial performance, and strategic initiatives. The presentation will include forward-looking s
